mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Aproducts (ser, userid, itemid) values (Aproduct.nextval, #{userid}, #{itemid})
mapper.select: SELECT a.pnum, a.picture, a.pname, a.file1, a.subject, a.price, a.readcnt, TO_CHAR(a.regdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS regdate FROM amem m JOIN aproducts ap ON m.id = ap.userid JOIN auction a ON ap.itemid = a.pnum WHERE m.id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.pnum DESC
